LEFT JOIN t_user temp_userCnName ON temp_userCnName.user_id = temp_basis_client.staff_id LEFT JOIN t_par_client_type temp_clientType ON temp_clientType.client_typeid = temp_basis_client.client_type_id LEFT JOIN t_par_client_source temp_clientSource ON temp_clientSource.client_source_id = temp_basis_client.client_source LEFT JOIN t_par_client_level temp_clientLevel ON temp_clientLevel.client_level_id = temp_basis_client.client_grade LEFT JOIN t_par_com_nature temp_comNature ON temp_comNature.nature_id = temp_basis_client.company_nature_id LEFT JOIN t_par_com_company_size temp_companySize ON temp_companySize.company_size_id = temp_basis_client.company_scale LEFT JOIN t_basis_client temp_basisClient ON temp_basisClient.client_id = temp_basis_client.superior_client_id
